description:
The Lippstadt League was a coalition of aristocratic families, led by Duke http://anidb.net/ch261 [Otto von Braunschweig], who revolted against the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire] in the Imperial Civil War. They claimed legitimacy in the name of protecting the Goldenbaum Dynasty against usurpers. Their main headquarters was http://anidb.net/ch1760 [Geiersberg Fortress], the single strongest fortress left in the Empire after the loss of http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn Fortress] to the http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets Alliance]. A total of 3,760 nobles joined, and the total number of armed men was 25.6 million. Its total fleet strength numbered approximately 150,000 ships.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Lippstadt Meiyaku
